Package com.linecorp.armeria.server.logging.structured

Interface StructuredLogBuilder<L>

  • Type Parameters:
    L - type of the structured log representation
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
    @Deprecated
@FunctionalInterface
public interface StructuredLogBuilder<L>
    Deprecated.
    Use AccessLogWriter.
    An interface that a structured log constructor should implement.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      L build​(RequestLog log)
      Deprecated.
      Builds a structured log instance based on a given RequestLog.

    • Method Detail

      • build

        @Nullable
L build​(RequestLog log)
        Deprecated.
        Builds a structured log instance based on a given RequestLog.
        Parameters:
        log - an instance of RequestLog which holds request and response information
        Returns:
        an instance of StructuredLogBuilder which represents an entry of structured logs or null if a builder thinks the given information isn't eligible to issue a structured log entry
